@graph.name: No Bake Cookies Without Milk - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: These chocolate peanut butter no bake cookies without milk are perfect when you feel like having a little treat and don't have enough time for real baking!

@graph.headline: No Bake Cookies Without Milk
@graph.keywords: chocolate no bake cookies,chocolate oatmeal cookies,chocolate peanut butter no bake cookies,easy no bake cookie recipe,how to make no bake cookies,no bake cookies without milk,no bake oatmeal cookies,no bake peanut butter oatmeal cookies,oatmeal cookies,peanut butter chocolate cookies,vegan cookies without baking,vegan no bake cookies,vegan oatmeal cookies

@graph.name: No Bake Cookies Without Milk
@graph.description: These chocolate peanut butter no bake cookies without milk are perfect when you feel like having a little treat and don't have enough time for real baking!
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon almond milk or other plant-based milk ((optional but recommended) )

recipeInstructions.text: First, melt the chocolate (either use a microwave or melt it on the stovetop).
recipeInstructions.name: First, melt the chocolate (either use a microwave or melt it on the stovetop).

recipeInstructions.text: Once it's melted, stir in the oats and the peanut butter and add a splash of the plant-based milk if using. Stir until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Once it's melted, stir in the oats and the peanut butter and add a splash of the plant-based milk if using. Stir until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Put some parchment paper on a plate and evenly divide the no bake cookie batter. Form about six cookies and place them in the fridge for at least 2-3 hours, so they got enough time to harden up.
recipeInstructions.name: Put some parchment paper on a plate and evenly divide the no bake cookie batter. Form about six cookies and place them in the fridge for at least 2-3 hours, so they got enough time to harden up.

@graph.keywords: no bake cookies with peanut butter, no bake cookies without milk, no bake oatmeal cookies
